document.full_text: international health alliance gavi is seeking $3.7 billion from a june 13 pledging conference in london to help deliver vaccines to nearly a quarter of a billion children across the world by 2015.
document.title: vaccine alliance seeks $3.7 bln from london meeting
lines_and_colors: international health alliance gavi is seeking $3.7 billion from a june 13 pledging conference in london to help deliver vaccines to nearly a quarter of a billion children across the world by 2015.
